function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increase in heat-related deaths due to hotter days and more frequent heatwaves","Impact":"Higher mortality rates from heat-related illnesses","Mitigation":"Implementation of heatwave early warning systems and heat-resistant infrastructure","Technologies":"Heat-resistant materials, urban heat island reduction technologies","People":"Urban population, especially vulnerable groups","Owner":"Local government, urban planners"},{"Description":"Increase in Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease and Cardio-vascular Disease due to particulate matter and wildfires","Impact":"Rise in respiratory and cardiovascular illnesses","Mitigation":"Air quality monitoring, wildfire prevention and control measures","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, particulate matter filtration systems","People":"Population in areas with high air pollution and wildfire risk","Owner":"Environmental agencies, government health departments"},{"Description":"Worsening of air quality and increase in airborne allergens leading to allergic diseases like asthma and rhino-conjunctivitis","Impact":"Higher rates of allergic diseases and respiratory conditions","Mitigation":"Implementation of pollen control measures and improved air filtration systems","Technologies":"Pollen monitoring devices, advanced air filtration technologies","People":"Urban and rural populations, especially those with allergies","Owner":"Public health departments, environmental agencies"}]}
